metadata.synopsis: An American (Stephen Lang) and his son (Ryan Slater) pursue poachers who captured a panda cub from a China wildlife preserve.

reviews: Adorable real pandas but otherwise sappy animal adventure.
Harmless family fare might be deemed politically correct for its concern for endangered species, but whitewashing of Chinese regime will strike adults... as somewhat bizarre.
Fine family film about the ties that bind-both human and animal.

Pandas are many things. Adorable fuzzballs. Voracious eaters. Vanishing species. But, as actors, they are black and white and dull all over, which The Amazing Panda Adventure demonstrates all too well.
